elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Mark with a cross whether the statements are correct or incorrect. Give reasons for incorrect statements in the text field below.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: All health insurance companies have the same basic insurance benefits. It therefore makes no difference which health insurance company you belong to.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Possible justification:
elements.correctAnswer: Since all health insurance companies must offer the same basic benefits in basic insurance, it is worth comparing prices. It may make sense to switch to the cheapest insurer. However, the notice period of the previous health insurance company must be observed.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Private insurance is not absolutely necessary for everyone. Most hospital stays last four or five days. Semi-private or general insurance is usually sufficient for this short period.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: With the HMO model or family doctor model, the health insurance company restricts the free choice of doctor, but guarantees a large discount on the premium.
